attributes.action: annually send to every taxpayer a report (U.K. plc) showing how and on what every Ministry spent their money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As with every Public Limited Company each Shareholder gets an Annual Shareholders report showing where their investments are made and spent and if there are any profits,how much.
As every Taxpayer in the U.K. is in effect a shareholder in the U.K. plc then every year We individualy  should be entitled to a report showing how every Ministry or Government Department spends OUR money.This should be sent to us personally. It should be broken down to wages for staff and even profit made from any source. Pie charts will do nicely.Don't forget Governments are elected to serve NOT rule.
